## General Cognitive Ability {#sec-iq}

{{< include _02-01_iq_text.qmd >}}

```{r}
#| label: data-iq
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
library(glue)
library(bwu)
# phenotype
pheno <- "iq"
# Filter by domain
domains <- c("General Cognitive Ability")
# Filter by scale
scales <- c(
  "Cognitive Efficiency",
  "Cognitive Proficiency (CPI)",
  "Cognitive Proficiency Index",
  "Cognitive Proficiency",
  "Crystallized Knowledge Index",
  "Crystallized Knowledge",
  "Fluid Reasoning (FRI)",
  "Fluid Reasoning Index",
  "Fluid Reasoning",
  "Full Scale (FSIQ)",
  "General Ability (GAI)",
  "General Ability Index",
  "General Ability",
  "General Intelligence",
  "NAB Attention Index",
  "NAB Executive Functions Index",
  "NAB Language Index",
  "NAB Memory Index",
  "NAB Spatial Index",
  "NAB Total Index",
  "Nonverbal (NVI)",
  "Perceptual Reasoning (PRI)",
  "Processing Speed (PSI)",
  "Processing Speed Index",
  "Processing Speed",
  "RBANS Total Index",
  "Test of Premorbid Functioning",
  "TOPF Standard Score",
  "Verbal Comprehension (VCI)",
  "Visual Spatial (VSI)",
  "Vocabulary Acquisition (VAI)",
  "Word Reading",
  "Working Memory (WMI)",
  "Working Memory Index",
  "Working Memory"
)
# data
data <- bwu::read_data(pheno = pheno)

# Filter data
data_iq <- bwu::filter_data(data, domain = domains, scale = scales)
```

```{r}
#| label: text-iq
#| cache: true
bwu::cat_neuropsych_results(data_iq, file = "_02-01_iq_text.qmd")
```

```{r}
#| label: qtbl-iq
#| dev: tikz
#| fig-process: pdf2png
options(tikzDefaltEngine = "xetex")

# footnotes
fn_standard_score <- gt::md("Standard Score: Mean = 100 [50th‰], SD ± 15 [16th‰, 84th‰]")
pheno <- "iq"
table_name <- "table_iq"
source_note <- gt::md("Standard Score: Mean = 100 [50th‰], SD ± 15 [16th‰, 84th‰]")
grp_iq <- list(
  standard_score = c(
    "Composite Scores", "NAB", "Test of Premorbid Functioning",
    "WRAT-5", "WAIS-IV", "WISC-5"
  )
)
vertical_padding <- 0.10
multiline <- TRUE
data <- data_iq

bwu::tbl_gt(
  data = data,
  pheno = pheno,
  table_name = table_name,
  # fn_standard_score = fn_standard_score,
  grp_standard_score = grp_iq[["standard_score"]],
  dynamic_grp = grp_iq,
  vertical_padding = vertical_padding,
  source_note = source_note,
  multiline = multiline
)
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-iq
#| fig-cap: "_Premorbid Ability_ is an estimate of an individual's intellectual functioning prior to known or suspected onset of brain disease or dysfunction. _General Ability_ is the overall skill to reason, solve problems, and gain useful knowledge. _Crystallized Knowledge_ involves understanding the world through language and reasoning. _Fluid Reasoning_ is the logical analysis and solution of new problems, identifying underlying patterns, and applying logic."

# Arguments
pheno <- "iq"
iq <-
  dplyr::filter(
    data,
    scale %in% c(
      "General Ability", "Crystallized Knowledge", "Fluid Reasoning",
      "Premorbid Ability", "TOPF Standard Score"
    )
  )
data <- iq
x <- data$z_mean_narrow
y <- data$narrow
colors <- NULL
return_plot <- FALSE
# return_plot <- Sys.getenv("RETURN_PLOT")
filename <- "fig_iq.svg"

# Make dotplot
bwu::dotplot(
  data = data,
  x = x,
  y = y,
  colors = colors,
  return_plot = return_plot,
  filename = filename
)
```
